title: Co-Teacher Feature Survey: Share Your Thoughts!
description: As part of our onging effort to improve co-teaching on Code.org, we're seeking your feedback on our new feature that allows you to add co-teachers to your sections. Your input is crucial in helping us make Code.org an even more effective and user-friendly platform. The survey should take no more than 5 minutes to complete - thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts and help us better support you and your co-instructors!

elements.name: rating_scale
elements.title: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the new ability to add co-teachers to your Code.org sections? (1=Not at all satisfied, 5=Extremely satisfied)

elements.name: negatives
elements.title: Have you encountered any issues while adding co-teachers to your sections and/or working with co-teachers on Code.org? Please explain.

elements.name: other_suggestions
elements.title: Which additional tools or features would you like to see developed to better support co-teaching on Code.org?
